1373: Galo was born in Die lange straet3 in 1373.
1376: Lost mother at the age of 3.
Galo took care of Galo since Galo was 4.
1389: Lost father at the age of 16.
1393: Got married to Sywi at age 21 in 1393.
Galo moved to Cromme straet.D.10 after marriage.
1394: Had a son with Sywi, Boidin, at age 21.
1395: Had a daughter with Sywi, Wijfgode, at age 22.
1398: Had a daughter with Sywi, Salome, at age 25.
1399: Lost his wife Sywi while she was giving birth to Meynolphus in 1399.
Became caretaker of Boidin, Wijfgode, Salome, Meynolphus at age 27.
Got married a second time to Clara at age 27 in 1399.
Had Clara move in at Cromme straet.D.10 after marriage.
